tgt_original: bhage liṅgaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya bodhicittaṃ na cotsṛjet |
vajrasya maṇau madhye catubinddhātmakaṃ cittavajraṃ yadā bhavati ,  tadāvajraparyaṅkataścittaṃ maṇyantargata mityucyate |

iha maṇyantantargataṃ tyajya bodhicittamantargataṃ mana ityucyate |  tenāntargatena manasā acyutabodhicittena karmamudrāprasaṅgena jñānamudrāprasaṅgena sthiracarasvabhāvātmakaṃ sarvākaravaropetaṃ bhāvayedaśeṣatai (to) yogī |
idaṃ vajrapade ca pañcavidhā (daṃ ca pañcavidhaṃ )
vairocano mahādīptiriti candrapratibhāsaḥ |  sa eva jñānajyotivirocanaśca |
jñānolkā iti rāhupratibhāsaḥ |  mahātejāḥ prabhāsvara iti sūryapratibhāsaḥ |  jñānolkā iti rāhupratibhāsaḥ |
